example[0]: It’s impossible for me to give you a definite answer.
example[1]: We need to record sufficient data to enable definite conclusions to be reached.
example[2]: He’d shown definite signs of resigning himself to the situation.
definition[1]: a definite arrangement, promise etc will happen in the way that someone has said
example[3]: Fix a definite date for the delivery of your computer.
definition[2]: saying something very firmly so that people understand exactly what you mean
example[4]: She’s not definite about retiring from the game.
